name: Mexican Baked Yam Fries
description: Try this pub-style Mexican favourite – easily made at home!
preparation: In a mixing bowl, combine yam strips with oil and seasoning. Arrange in a single layer on crisper or Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner or parchment paper.
Bake, turning several times, until crisp and slightly browned, approximately 25–30 minutes.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.
